apps.name: Fur Affinity
apps.subtitle: An unofficial native app for the furaffinity.net website.
apps.localizedDescription:
üêæ Connect with your furaffinity.net account and enjoy the furry community in a native app.

üì± FEATURES
- Browse the latest submissions from your followed artists, add favorites and leave comments!
- Read and participate to artists journals.
- Check received notes and notifications.
- Browse user profiles to check their content and eventually follow them!

This app is opensource and its sources are available at https://github.com/Ceylo/FurAffinityApp

üîó Website: https://furaffinity.app
üîó Privacy policy: https://github.com/Ceylo/FurAffinityApp/blob/main/Privacy%20Policy.md

versions.localizedDescription:
üí¨ The Fur Affinity app is available through AltStore PAL, AltStore World and SideStore. See https://furaffinity.app/ for more details.

üì± FEATURES
- Improved submission fullscreen view: you can now use a single tap to display a submission zoomed in and in fullscreen. Then tap one more time to change again the zoom level.
- The Notifications tab now displays a badge when you have notifications. By default, all supported types of notifications are taken into account, except journal notifications. You can change this behavior in the Settings tab.
- Scrolling through a user's gallery, scraps or favorites now automatically loads the next page when needed. This effectively makes scrolling infinite as long as more content is available.
- User's gallery, scraps and favorites now have a search field at the top. Combined with infinite loading, this effectively allows searching through a full gallery, scraps or favorites of any user. Search is case insensitive and done on the submissions title and author.

üì¶ MISCELLANEOUS
- Submissions and journals where comments have been disabled is now reflected in the app: the comment icon has a different color and tapping it will inform that posting a comment is not possible.

üí¨ The Fur Affinity app is available through AltStore PAL, AltStore World and SideStore. See https://furaffinity.app/ for more details.

üì± FEATURES
- Submissions featuring animated GIFs are now displayed animated. Downloading also preserves the animation
- Avatars using an animated GIF are now displayed animated by default. A setting was added in case you prefer to disable avatar animations
- Avatars and submission thumbnails are now loaded in advance, so you'll mostly not see them loading anymore
- Scrolling through galleries and the submissions feed has again been made much smoother
- User profiles now give access to the user's journals
- In addition to swiping to the left, replying to comments is now also available through long press
- Touching avatars in notifications now opens the corresponding user profile

üêû BUGFIXES
- Fixed a rare case where the submission zoomable sheet could be opened before the full submission is actually loaded
- Fixed a rare crash that could happen when deleting notifications one by one

üì¶ MISCELLANEOUS
- iOS 16 support has been removed, iOS 17.4 or later is now required
- The top right action button in Notifications tab doesn't display the Nuke action anymore for types of notifications whose section is already empty
- Logging out will now forget what was the last viewed submission. Logging in to the same or a different account will then display the latest submissions instead of going back to this last viewed submission
- A new item in the Settings tab allows deleting cached files
- Haptic feedback has been added when a download is successful, a submission is marked as favorite, a comment has been successfully submitted or when you watch a user
- When Notifications and Notes tabs are empty, they can now be pulled to refresh

üí¨ The Fur Affinity app is available through AltStore PAL, AltStore World and SideStore. See https://furaffinity.app/ for more details.

üêû BUGFIXES
‚Ä¢ Fix ability to refresh the submissions feed when it is empty (regression from 1.9.0)
‚Ä¢ Fix the submissions feed loading after app start when it tries to restore the feed position to a submission that is now gone, for instance after nuking all submission notifications (regression from 1.9.0)

Release notes for version 1.9.0:
üì± FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Shout notifications are now displayed in the Notifications tab
‚Ä¢ User watch and "watched by" lists are now accessible from user profiles. Additionally, the watchlist features a search field allowing to look for a specific user
‚Ä¢ The scroll position of the submissions feed is now preserved when restarting the app
‚Ä¢ Speed improvements:
    ‚Ä¢ Until furaffinity.net answers and provide the full data, user profiles now first display a preview content instead of a progress indicator
    ‚Ä¢ A lot more avatars get cached and are thus available for early display
    ‚Ä¢ Scrolling through favorites is much smoother
    ‚Ä¢ Submissions or journals with many comments are loaded much faster

üêû BUGFIXES
‚Ä¢ Fix new submissions notification bubble sometimes not dismissing
‚Ä¢ Fix navigation bar sometimes becoming bigger when navigating back

üì¶ MISCELLANEOUS
‚Ä¢ The login screen has been redesigned
‚Ä¢ Analytics have been migrated from "Microsoft AppCenter" to "Amplitude"

üí¨ The Fur Affinity app is available through AltStore PAL, AltStore World and SideStore. See https://furaffinity.app/ for more details.

üì± FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Shout notifications are now displayed in the Notifications tab
‚Ä¢ User watch and "watched by" lists are now accessible from user profiles. Additionally, the watchlist features a search field allowing to look for a specific user
‚Ä¢ The scroll position of the submissions feed is now preserved when restarting the app
‚Ä¢ Speed improvements:
    ‚Ä¢ Until furaffinity.net answers and provide the full data, user profiles now first display a preview content instead of a progress indicator
    ‚Ä¢ A lot more avatars get cached and are thus available for early display
    ‚Ä¢ Scrolling through favorites is much smoother
    ‚Ä¢ Submissions or journals with many comments are loaded much faster

üêû BUGFIXES
‚Ä¢ Fix new submissions notification bubble sometimes not dismissing
‚Ä¢ Fix navigation bar sometimes becoming bigger when navigating back

üì¶ MISCELLANEOUS
‚Ä¢ The login screen has been redesigned
‚Ä¢ Analytics have been migrated from "Microsoft AppCenter" to "Amplitude"

FEATURES
- User view now gives access to the user's gallery, scraps, favorites and shouts. Users can also be followed or unfollowed.
- Hide furaffinity.net latency on submissions loading by first displaying the thumbnail when possible
- Display hidden/deleted comments in comment threads
- Display journal comment notifications in the Notifications tab
- Display the number of favorites and comments next to their respective controls in submissions
- Notes sent by a deleted user are now properly displayed
- New app icon designed by [BAKA.RASU](https://www.instagram.com/baka.rasu/) üéâ

MISC
- More resilient notifications loading
- Preserve link color as chosen by FA users instead of forcing it to be blue
- Many UI improvements, including in particular clearer comments UI through the use of bubbles

BUG FIXES
- Fix crash when deleting a notification
- Fix transparent tab bar on iOS 17
- Fixed temporarily incorrect contents layout when loading a submission, note or journal
- Fix loading of the user view for banned users

FEATURES

- Extended in app navigation: opening links to journals now displays them within the app. Journals feature the same controls (including comments) as submissions, except the Download and Favorite controls.
- New "Notifications" tab: this lists all submission comment and journal notifications from https://www.furaffinity.net/msg/others/ and lets you jump to the corresponding submission or journal from there.
The "Notifications" screen provides a control in top right to nuke all submission comment or journal notifications.
- Draft comments on the current submission or journal are saved until posted. So you can freely go back and check the submission or journal details before continuing your own comment. Leaving the submission or journal will discard the draft.
- The comment editor now displays the comment you're answering to.

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Chosen images will be saved to the Photo Library.

news.title: "Ceylo's Apps Hub" is now also in AltStore PAL!
news.caption: If you live in the European Union, you can now benefit from this source without sideloading. Tap here for install steps.
